flawed_nl_solution:
Jenny is older than Charlie by 5 years who is older than Bobby by 3 years, so Jenny is older than Bobby by 5+3 = <<6=6>>6 years
Jenny will be twice as old as Bobby when he is 6*2 = <<6*2=12>>12 years old
Jenny is 5 years older than Charlie so when Jenny is 12, Charlie will be 12-5 = <<12-5=7>>7 years old
#### 7

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 6. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
